title: Justin Bieber insists he and Taylor Swift are 'cool' amid feud rumours
text:

Pop sensation and married man Justin Bieber has cleared the air with fans about his supposed beef with fellow star Taylor Swift .

Shake It Off singer Taylor has previously accused Justin and his manager, Scooter Braun of bullying her.

Swifties everywhere were left enraged by a recent video of Justin recorded by new wife Hailey Baldwin.

In the clip, Justin cries: "It's not the banana that I wanted!"

Taylor's fans reckoned he was mocking a video of her in which she struggles to get a banana following surgery.

Despite battle lines being drawn between each's fans, it seems things aren't quite so heated between Justin and Taylor themselves.

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: Splash news / SplashNews.com)

Taking a stroll outside his recording studio in Los Angeles, Justin was posed the question of their supposed feud.

The 26 year-old appeared to say: "We've always been cool."

Later he added: "I'm done with all that other stuff. Other people's drama is not my drama."

Hailey has taken to social media to stick up for her man after the banana video failed to go down well.

Posting a clip of a Taylor fan, the blond beauty wrote: "I never knew I could make somebody so upset...truly I'm so sorry you're THIS upset?! Lord have mercy I hope I'm never this upset about someone I don't know!!"

(Image: Instagram)

Fans could be forgiven for thinking they're still not on good terms - in June this year, Taylor posted a blog post after Scooter, Justin's manager, bought Big Machine Records, which owns most of Taylor's master recordings.

Taylor claimed that that had never been an option for her, and that Scooter of all people owning them was her "worst case scenario."

Justin didn't take well to the post, and replied: "What were you trying to accomplish by posting that blog?

"Seems to me like it was to get sympathy u also knew that in posting that your fans would go and bully Scooter."

Still, the heartthrob later apologised: "Hey Taylor. First of all I would like to apologise for posting that hurtful Instagram post, at the time I thought it was funny, but looking back it was hurtful and insensitive."
description: Justin was filmed outside his recording studio when he told paparazzi that he and Taylor are on good terms despite rumours of bad blood
